oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Western Dance Parade - 1947-10-25 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: KVOO, Tulsa, OK broadcast of Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band's Western Dance Parade (1947-10-25, part 1), held at the Pla-mor Ballroom with host Johnny Ryan. Featuring vocalist Jimmy Hall and pianist Morris Billington.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Leon McAuliffe; Western Swing Band (Leon McAuliffe)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Announcer introduces Johnny Ryan -- Opening statement (Johnny Ryan) -- Theme (Steel Guitar Rag) -- Johnny Ryan introduces Leon McAuliffe -- Hawaiian War Chant (Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) -- Johnny Ryan reads listener requests -- I'll Hold You In My Heart (Till I Can Hold You In My Arms) (Jimmy Hall vocals, Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) -- Johnny Ryan and Leon McAuliffe talk -- I Know My Baby Loves Me In Her Own Peculiar Way (Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) -- Johnny Ryan reads listener requests
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KVOO (Radio station : Tulsa, Okla.); Western dance parade (Radio program); McAuliffe, Leon, 1917-1988; Western Swing Band (Musical group : Leon McAuliffe); Ryan, Johnny (Announcer); Hall, Jimmy, 1921-; Billington, Morris
